Name: Snub-Cape
LongDescription: Enables the occasional use of a move with no PP consumption. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Snubbull and Granbull.  Finding a Snub-Cape at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
